Citi makes a significant investment to provide valuable benefit programs for all employees around the world.  These include core health, insurance and retirement programs as well as supplementary programs.
Our global benefits philosophy requires that programs should deliver quality benefits and be simple to understand, to access and communicate. Our Live Well at Citi Global Health Strategy, offers best in class wellness programs, tools and resources to help employees lead healthier lives. We strive to inspire accountability, improve health and productivity while managing our healthcare costs. Our programs are designed to support Citi’s values and help to attract, motivate and retain a diverse workforce within a collaborative work environment.

We care about your health and happiness and we want you to be at your best. At Oracle, you’ll enjoy a competitive benefits package with a variety of customizable medical options, savings plans, and wellness programs.
We also don’t think your life should be on hold from Monday to Friday. Generous amounts of time off, flexible work options, and lots of fun employee activities are all an important part of leading a balanced a life.
Hear about flexibility from Leor, one of Oracle’s Karate Club black belts—and make sure to check out some reviews from our employees.

company_benefits_employer_summary:
Our portfolio of benefits, programs and services is designed to make sure our employees are healthy and comfortable, while encouraging creativity inside and outside of the office. Here are a few of the highlights of working at Levi Strauss & Co.:
EMPLOYEE BENEFITS

HEALTH AND FITNESS: LS&Co. offers competitive benefit options and a flexible plan design. Employees can handpick medical, dental, vision and life insurance plans that are right for them.
APPAREL: Corporate employees receive a discount at all company owned- and-operated stores and e-commerce sites. They may also purchase Levi’s®, Dockers® and Signature by Levi Strauss & Co.™ apparel at a significant discount at periodic sample sales.
TECHNOLOGY AND BUSINESS SERVICES: Employees are eligible for discounts with Apple, HP, Microsoft, Staples and AT&T Wireless.

Please visit our External Careers Site for more information http://www.levistrauss.com/careers/#benefits

company_benefits_employer_summary:
Financial Benefits:

Next-day pay for quick access to your earnings
Weekend, overnight, and holiday pay incentives to recognize your hard work
401(k) and Profit Sharing programs to help you plan for your financial future
Referral bonuses for bringing in new team members and making a difference together

Health and Wellness Benefits:

Comprehensive medical, dental, vision, disability, and life insurance coverage
Health Savings Account (HSA), Flexible Spending Account (FSA), and Dependent Care Account (DCA) options to help you manage healthcare expenses
Tobacco cessation program to promote a healthier lifestyle - Get paid to quit smoking!
Mental health support to prioritize your well-being

Professional Development Benefits:

Paid training and certifications to help you develop new skills and advance your career
Tuition, licensure, and certification reimbursement to support your ongoing professional development
Opportunities for career advancement and growth to help you achieve your professional goals

Time Off Benefits:

Paid holidays to celebrate with family and friends
Paid time off (PTO) to help you recharge and maintain work-life balance
Floating holiday to use when you need it, for those unexpected moments or important personal events

Other Benefits:

Mileage and activity reimbursement for work-related travel
Flexible scheduling to fit your availability and personal needs
Employee appreciation programs to recognize your contributions and efforts

company_benefits_employer_summary:
PayPal wants our employees to feel secure in their benefits, and we support your mental, physical, and emotional balance. Best of all, you are eligible for coverage on your date of hire.   Health and Welfare
Our fulltime U.S.-based employees are eligible for a variety of medical, dental, and vision plans, as well as Short- and Long-Term Disability, Life Insurance, and Accidental Death & Dismemberment (AD&D). Coverage choices for medical coverage will vary, depending on your US location. Dental and vision plan choices are available.   Financial Security 
Your financial security is important to us, so we offer a variety of options to choose from, including 401k Savings Plan, Employee Stock Purchase Plan, and Flexible Spending Accounts for health care and dependent care.  Time-Off Programs
PayPal recognizes that as employees pass through various life stages, their time away needs change accordingly. We provide support through the following programs: 

Sabbatical Program: 4 weeks of paid leave after completion of 5 years of service
Tracking-Free Vacation: all U.S.-based exempt employees self-manage vacation and work with supervisors to schedule time off.
Give Time: After one year of employment, eligible employees are paid 100% of base pay, or 8 hours/year, to volunteer at a qualifying community-based organization
Paid Sick Leave
Enhanced Maternity Benefit
Paid Bonding Leave within the first year of the birth or placement of a child; available to all mothers, fathers, same-sex spouses, and domestic partners
Paid Family Care Leave allows paid time off for employees to care for a seriously ill family member
Holidays: PayPal observes 10 holidays each year


Additional benefits to support your everyday living include adoption assistance, educational assistance, and employee assistance. We have the added extras too – group legal benefits, identity theft protection, and we even offer pet insurance.

company_benefits_employer_summary:
At Bruker, we believe that health matters. Therefore, our benefit package is designed to offer flexibility and stability in the overall health, financial, and work/life balance of our employees and their families.

Health Matters – Bruker’s health programs start on day one, including your choice of 3 medical plan options, a comprehensive dental plan, flexible vision coverage and access to Flexible Spending Accounts.
Wellness Matters – Bruker promotes employee engagement and education with wellness challenges, hosting wellness webinars, holding an annual benefits fair, and delivering quarterly newsletters.
Financial Wellness Matters – Bruker offers a 401(k) Retirement Plan with company matching, company provided life and disability benefits to protect employees and their families, access to ID Theft Protection and many additional voluntary benefits to create peace of mind.
Work/Life Balance Matters – Bruker offers a generous time off program including sick time, vacation, 11 holidays and a year-end shut down.

Total Rewards
At Healthfirst, we provide a Total Rewards program that allows us to attract, engage and retain talented team members who embody our culture and share our commitment to provide the highest quality healthcare and related services to our members.
Health and Wellness
Our benefits packages include health and wellness benefits, as well as additional employee perks. 

Health benefits include: 

Medical, Dental, and Vision plan options
Wellness credits
Spring Health mental wellness program
Maternity, Bereavement, and Short Term/Long Term Disability leave options
Additional optional health coverage plans


Wellness benefits include:

Paid Time Off
9 Paid holidays, and 6 early office closure days
Social Justice day
Free Peloton App membership and discounts on bikes and treadmills
Health Food Cafes


Employee perks include:

401k with up to 6% match after 1 year
Annual incentive and merit increase potential
Tuition reimbursement for approved degree programs and certifications
Discounts and deals on travel, select memberships, and other special offers

company_benefits_employer_summary:
Holiday Pay
Holiday pay will be eight (8) hours at the regular straight time rate if they are scheduled to work the
last scheduled work day before the holiday and the first scheduled work day after the holiday.
Company Holiday is about 10 days per year (including 6 major holidays—New year/President’s
day/Memorial Day/Independence Day/Labor Day/Thanksgiving Day)
Paid Time Off
PTO - 128 hours per year (about 10.66 hours per month)
Full-Time employees begin accruing PTO upon completion of the first pay period after the date of
hire and may request to use their accrued PTO hours at the minimum increments of one (1) hour.
Physical Check-up Leave Time- 16 hours per calendar year and become eligible to use after 90
days of employment at the minimum increment of one (1) hour. The balance resets on January 1st.
 
Health insurance and other benefit plans
Group medical insurance plan- The company offers group medical, dental, prescription drug
vision, life and short term/long term disability insurance coverage to employees upon the date of
hire.
Other Group benefit plans- The company offers Health Care/Dependent Care FSA to regular
full-time employees after 90 days from the date of hire.
 
401k plan
Eligibility- upon completion of six (6) months of service and if they are at least twenty-one (21)
years old.
Company match- The Company will make a Safe Harbor Matching Contribution equal to 100.0% of
your Elective Deferrals between 1 ~ 3%, 50% of your Elective Deferrals between 4 ~ 5%. (Thus, the
maximum matching contribution is 4.0 %.)
 
*Note: Benefit information may change without notice
Last revised on October 2019

company_benefits_employer_summary:
As an industry leader, Delta is proud to offer to all of our employees an appealing compensation package including competitive pay, excellent benefits and worldwide travel privileges.

Medical coverage, with options depending on where you live
Dental coverage with 3 options from which to choose
Vision coverage through Davis Vision
Domestic partner program which includes medical, dental and vision
Life insurance coverage of $50,000 provided by Delta
Optional additional life/dependent life/group accident/private pilot insurance
Optional disability benefit
Flexible spending accounts to cover eligible expenses
Employee assistance program, which focuses on your mental and emotional well being

Committed to maximizing your total compensation package and helping you plan for your financial future, Delta provides eligible employees access to a 401(k) savings plan, along with a profit sharing plan and a shared rewards program.

401(k) plan with automatic enrollment, automatic company contribution equal to 3% of your eligible pay and a 100% company match for the first 6% you contribute
Profit sharing with eligibility beginning on day one of employment; payout levels and amounts can vary annually, but in 2019 Delta distributed more than 16% of its pre-tax income
Shared reward program with monthly payouts based on the achievement of company wide goals
Paid vacation, holiday and personal time


Free and reduced rate travel benefits for you and your eligible family members
Matching gifts to education programs, up to $2,000 per year
Adoption assistance program with eligibility beginning on day one of employment
Employee discounts on a variety of products and services
An employee-powered scholarship fund, which awarded a total of $1.09 million to 591 recipients in 2017.

company_benefits_employer_summary:
The Willis Towers Watson Global Total Rewards Philosophy aligns with our business strategy and supports our company values.  Our objective is to attract, retain, engage and develop the diverse talent that will lead to our collective success.  We offer market competitive programs that create a pay for performance culture, and provide choice in specific program features, wherever practical, to reflect the variety of colleague demographics and preferences in our global workforce.
Our Total Rewards Philosophy includes the following elements and types of programs, tailored as appropriate for specific roles and markets:

Foundational: Programs serving as the core elements of our overall Total Rewards program
Performance Based: Programs and opportunities driven by company, team and/or colleague success
Career and Environmental: Programs and opportunities supporting colleague growth, performance, community and work-life integration

company_benefits_employer_summary:
PayPal wants our employees to feel secure in their benefits, and we support your mental, physical, and emotional balance. Best of all, you are eligible for coverage on your date of hire.   Health and Welfare
Our fulltime U.S.-based employees are eligible for a variety of medical, dental, and vision plans, as well as Short- and Long-Term Disability, Life Insurance, and Accidental Death & Dismemberment (AD&D). Coverage choices for medical coverage will vary, depending on your US location. Dental and vision plan choices are available.   Financial Security 
Your financial security is important to us, so we offer a variety of options to choose from, including 401k Savings Plan, Employee Stock Purchase Plan, and Flexible Spending Accounts for health care and dependent care.  Time-Off Programs
PayPal recognizes that as employees pass through various life stages, their time away needs change accordingly. We provide support through the following programs: 

Sabbatical Program: 4 weeks of paid leave after completion of 5 years of service
Tracking-Free Vacation: all U.S.-based exempt employees self-manage vacation and work with supervisors to schedule time off.
Give Time: After one year of employment, eligible employees are paid 100% of base pay, or 8 hours/year, to volunteer at a qualifying community-based organization
Paid Sick Leave
Enhanced Maternity Benefit
Paid Bonding Leave within the first year of the birth or placement of a child; available to all mothers, fathers, same-sex spouses, and domestic partners
Paid Family Care Leave allows paid time off for employees to care for a seriously ill family member
Holidays: PayPal observes 10 holidays each year


Additional benefits to support your everyday living include adoption assistance, educational assistance, and employee assistance. We have the added extras too – group legal benefits, identity theft protection, and we even offer pet insurance.

It also gives you the opportunity to invest in your future through additional financial security. You're covered day in and day out.

Market-competitive base pay

401(k) retirement savings plan

Leadership training
Collegeboundfund

company_benefits_employer_summary:
A productive and innovative workplace starts with the well-being of our employees. At iHeartMedia, the health and welfare of our team is of the utmost importance. We offer an extensive range of benefits that allow our employees to bring their best selves to work each day and we strive to continue to make iHeartMedia a great place to work:

Health & Wellness: Our comprehensive benefits package includes medical, dental and vision coverage, as well as family life and accident insurance.
Time Away: Our time-off policy offers 15 paid holidays, half-days before key holidays, plus vacation.
Financial: Employees can participate in a 401(k) program.
Our benefits programs also includes a variety of flexible spending accounts.
Parental Leave: Your family is part of the iHeartMedia family. We support employees throughout their lives, including the growth of their families with our Parental Leave policy, as well as additional short-term voluntary disability.
Other benefits: We offer voluntary benefits at discounted rates, including pet, legal and auto/home insurance, as well as identity theft.

company_benefits_employer_summary:
PayPal wants our employees to feel secure in their benefits, and we support your mental, physical, and emotional balance. Best of all, you are eligible for coverage on your date of hire.   Health and Welfare
Our fulltime U.S.-based employees are eligible for a variety of medical, dental, and vision plans, as well as Short- and Long-Term Disability, Life Insurance, and Accidental Death & Dismemberment (AD&D). Coverage choices for medical coverage will vary, depending on your US location. Dental and vision plan choices are available.   Financial Security 
Your financial security is important to us, so we offer a variety of options to choose from, including 401k Savings Plan, Employee Stock Purchase Plan, and Flexible Spending Accounts for health care and dependent care.  Time-Off Programs
PayPal recognizes that as employees pass through various life stages, their time away needs change accordingly. We provide support through the following programs: 

Sabbatical Program: 4 weeks of paid leave after completion of 5 years of service
Tracking-Free Vacation: all U.S.-based exempt employees self-manage vacation and work with supervisors to schedule time off.
Give Time: After one year of employment, eligible employees are paid 100% of base pay, or 8 hours/year, to volunteer at a qualifying community-based organization
Paid Sick Leave
Enhanced Maternity Benefit
Paid Bonding Leave within the first year of the birth or placement of a child; available to all mothers, fathers, same-sex spouses, and domestic partners
Paid Family Care Leave allows paid time off for employees to care for a seriously ill family member
Holidays: PayPal observes 10 holidays each year


Additional benefits to support your everyday living include adoption assistance, educational assistance, and employee assistance. We have the added extras too – group legal benefits, identity theft protection, and we even offer pet insurance.

company_benefits_employer_summary:
Our programs are tailored to support the needs of our employees and their families. We recognize the value of a diverse workforce and therefore include coverage for domestic partners and the children of domestic partners for our eligible employees.
The health and wellbeing of our employees is very important to us. We foster a culture of health through health fairs, and programs and activities that support healthy nutrition and exercise.
Product Allowance
We encourage our employees to act as ambassadors of our brands. To support this effort, eligible employees over the age of 21 have a product allowance to promote our brands with friends and family.
Additional Perks:

Flexible Work Environment
Casual dress code
Summer Fridays
Comprehensive health & wellness programs
Fertility & childcare benefits
Generous paid time off (including HQ being closed Christmas through New Years)
Yearly agility allowance
Tuition scholarships & reimbursement programs
Weekly themed happy hours
Access to relevant and modern learning opportunities
Community outreach and charitable gifting
Company car (or allowance) for eligible roles

company_benefits_employer_summary:
At Bruker, we believe that health matters. Therefore, our benefit package is designed to offer flexibility and stability in the overall health, financial, and work/life balance of our employees and their families.

Health Matters – Bruker’s health programs start on day one, including your choice of 3 medical plan options, a comprehensive dental plan, flexible vision coverage and access to Flexible Spending Accounts.
Wellness Matters – Bruker promotes employee engagement and education with wellness challenges, hosting wellness webinars, holding an annual benefits fair, and delivering quarterly newsletters.
Financial Wellness Matters – Bruker offers a 401(k) Retirement Plan with company matching, company provided life and disability benefits to protect employees and their families, access to ID Theft Protection and many additional voluntary benefits to create peace of mind.
Work/Life Balance Matters – Bruker offers a generous time off program including sick time, vacation, 11 holidays and a year-end shut down.

company_benefits_employer_summary:
A productive and innovative workplace starts with the well-being of our employees. At iHeartMedia, the health and welfare of our team is of the utmost importance. We offer an extensive range of benefits that allow our employees to bring their best selves to work each day and we strive to continue to make iHeartMedia a great place to work:

Health & Wellness: Our comprehensive benefits package includes medical, dental and vision coverage, as well as family life and accident insurance.
Time Away: Our time-off policy offers 15 paid holidays, half-days before key holidays, plus vacation.
Financial: Employees can participate in a 401(k) program.
Our benefits programs also includes a variety of flexible spending accounts.
Parental Leave: Your family is part of the iHeartMedia family. We support employees throughout their lives, including the growth of their families with our Parental Leave policy, as well as additional short-term voluntary disability.
Other benefits: We offer voluntary benefits at discounted rates, including pet, legal and auto/home insurance, as well as identity theft.

company_benefits_employer_summary:
Our portfolio of benefits, programs and services is designed to make sure our employees are healthy and comfortable, while encouraging creativity inside and outside of the office. Here are a few of the highlights of working at Levi Strauss & Co.:
EMPLOYEE BENEFITS

HEALTH AND FITNESS: LS&Co. offers competitive benefit options and a flexible plan design. Employees can handpick medical, dental, vision and life insurance plans that are right for them.
APPAREL: Corporate employees receive a discount at all company owned- and-operated stores and e-commerce sites. They may also purchase Levi’s®, Dockers® and Signature by Levi Strauss & Co.™ apparel at a significant discount at periodic sample sales.
TECHNOLOGY AND BUSINESS SERVICES: Employees are eligible for discounts with Apple, HP, Microsoft, Staples and AT&T Wireless.

Please visit our External Careers Site for more information http://www.levistrauss.com/careers/#benefits

company_benefits_employer_summary:
Our programs are tailored to support the needs of our employees and their families. We recognize the value of a diverse workforce and therefore include coverage for domestic partners and the children of domestic partners for our eligible employees.
The health and wellbeing of our employees is very important to us. We foster a culture of health through health fairs, and programs and activities that support healthy nutrition and exercise.
Product Allowance
We encourage our employees to act as ambassadors of our brands. To support this effort, eligible employees over the age of 21 have a product allowance to promote our brands with friends and family.
Additional Perks:

Flexible Work Environment
Casual dress code
Summer Fridays
Comprehensive health & wellness programs
Fertility & childcare benefits
Generous paid time off (including HQ being closed Christmas through New Years)
Yearly agility allowance
Tuition scholarships & reimbursement programs
Weekly themed happy hours
Access to relevant and modern learning opportunities
Community outreach and charitable gifting
Company car (or allowance) for eligible roles

company_benefits_employer_summary: When the unexpected occursâa serious illness, a long absence from work, even deathâwe count on Stryker-sponsored healthcare and welfare benefits for financial protection. In addition, Stryker Corporation sponsors the Stryker Corporation 401(k) Savings and Retirement Plan so that you and other employees of Stryker and its participating subsidiaries (all referred to in this Summary as the "Company") may save for retirement on a "before-tax" basis. The benefits provided under the 401(k) Plan are in addition to Social Security. The information presented in the Benefits Summary makes it easy to understand your benefits. Consider this handbook, which is available in print and online at http://www.totalrewards.stryker.com/spd, your first resource whenever you have a question about what is covered, how to file claims or your rights as a plan participant. The benefits described are summaries of the official plan documents and contracts, which govern the plans. They are written in plain language to help you understand how the plans work.

We strive to provide our team members and their loved ones with a comprehensive suite of well-being benefits that support the whole you—your physical health, your mental, emotional and financial well-being, and social connections to your community.

Clean Harbors delivers a Total Compensation package with:

Competitive market salaries
Pay increases based on gained skills acquired through training and experience. These increases are offered through an industry leading competency based progression and pay program.
Comprehensive health, dental and retirement programs offered for you and your family members.
Paid Parental Leave. 
Employee Stock Purchase Program. 
Recognition and incentives based on your contribution to the team.
Support for developing and learning new skills as well as sharing knowledge.

Tuition reimbursement, including a partnership with Purdue Global where employees can pursue undergradute degrees at no cost, to support your continuous development and growth.

company_benefits_employer_summary:
PayPal wants our employees to feel secure in their benefits, and we support your mental, physical, and emotional balance. Best of all, you are eligible for coverage on your date of hire.   Health and Welfare
Our fulltime U.S.-based employees are eligible for a variety of medical, dental, and vision plans, as well as Short- and Long-Term Disability, Life Insurance, and Accidental Death & Dismemberment (AD&D). Coverage choices for medical coverage will vary, depending on your US location. Dental and vision plan choices are available.   Financial Security 
Your financial security is important to us, so we offer a variety of options to choose from, including 401k Savings Plan, Employee Stock Purchase Plan, and Flexible Spending Accounts for health care and dependent care.  Time-Off Programs
PayPal recognizes that as employees pass through various life stages, their time away needs change accordingly. We provide support through the following programs: 

Sabbatical Program: 4 weeks of paid leave after completion of 5 years of service
Tracking-Free Vacation: all U.S.-based exempt employees self-manage vacation and work with supervisors to schedule time off.
Give Time: After one year of employment, eligible employees are paid 100% of base pay, or 8 hours/year, to volunteer at a qualifying community-based organization
Paid Sick Leave
Enhanced Maternity Benefit
Paid Bonding Leave within the first year of the birth or placement of a child; available to all mothers, fathers, same-sex spouses, and domestic partners
Paid Family Care Leave allows paid time off for employees to care for a seriously ill family member
Holidays: PayPal observes 10 holidays each year


Additional benefits to support your everyday living include adoption assistance, educational assistance, and employee assistance. We have the added extras too – group legal benefits, identity theft protection, and we even offer pet insurance.

We care about your health and happiness and we want you to be at your best. At Oracle, you’ll enjoy a competitive benefits package with a variety of customizable medical options, savings plans, and wellness programs.
We also don’t think your life should be on hold from Monday to Friday. Generous amounts of time off, flexible work options, and lots of fun employee activities are all an important part of leading a balanced a life.
Hear about flexibility from Leor, one of Oracle’s Karate Club black belts—and make sure to check out some reviews from our employees.

company_benefits_employer_summary: The benefits of working for an organization like Kaiser Permanente go beyond what might be considered traditional “benefits.” Sure, we offer competitive compensation. And our medical coverage is pretty amazing, as are our retirement plans. But it’s our commitment to caring for our employees holistically that rounds out the benefit of joining our team.Being a care-driven organization, we value health, wellness, and happiness above all and know that reaching your potential at work often starts with being your best outside of it. We recognize the benefit of wellness and work-life balance and provide many tools and resources to help our employees thrive. In fact, we’re consistently named a Best Employer for Healthy Lifestyles by the National Business Group on Health!Beyond encouraging everyone to be their best self, we also know that feeling good comes from owning your professional development. Which is why we embrace learning as a way of life. Whether you sit on the clinical, technical, or business side of our organization, you’ll be encouraged to explore your potential through career paths and educational opportunities that match your ambitions.While specific benefits vary based on location, position, scheduled hours, and representation by collective bargaining or employee groups, they generally include what you see in the summary below.

company_benefits_employer_summary:
Holiday Pay
Holiday pay will be eight (8) hours at the regular straight time rate if they are scheduled to work the
last scheduled work day before the holiday and the first scheduled work day after the holiday.
Company Holiday is about 10 days per year (including 6 major holidays—New year/President’s
day/Memorial Day/Independence Day/Labor Day/Thanksgiving Day)
Paid Time Off
PTO - 128 hours per year (about 10.66 hours per month)
Full-Time employees begin accruing PTO upon completion of the first pay period after the date of
hire and may request to use their accrued PTO hours at the minimum increments of one (1) hour.
Physical Check-up Leave Time- 16 hours per calendar year and become eligible to use after 90
days of employment at the minimum increment of one (1) hour. The balance resets on January 1st.
 
Health insurance and other benefit plans
Group medical insurance plan- The company offers group medical, dental, prescription drug
vision, life and short term/long term disability insurance coverage to employees upon the date of
hire.
Other Group benefit plans- The company offers Health Care/Dependent Care FSA to regular
full-time employees after 90 days from the date of hire.
 
401k plan
Eligibility- upon completion of six (6) months of service and if they are at least twenty-one (21)
years old.
Company match- The Company will make a Safe Harbor Matching Contribution equal to 100.0% of
your Elective Deferrals between 1 ~ 3%, 50% of your Elective Deferrals between 4 ~ 5%. (Thus, the
maximum matching contribution is 4.0 %.)
 
*Note: Benefit information may change without notice
Last revised on October 2019

company_benefits_employer_summary:
UK Careers - Rewards & Benefits
 
Contented employees are more effective employees. In our case, that means coming up with even smarter ideas to fulfil customers' needs and power our own growth. That's why we work so hard to treat you so well.
First of all, you can look forward to working alongside some of the most cutting-edge technology this country has to offer, with a company that's proud to offer world-class training and to make a difference in the wider world. In addition to all of this, we offer a tremendous range of benefits, including:

Pension - As a member of our award-winning pension scheme, you'll enjoy a range of benefits designed to suit you and your family.
Annual leave - On joining, you'll be entitled to 25 days' holiday (plus bank holidays), increasing to 26 days after five years and 27 after ten.
Share Incentive Plan - Our plan allows you to purchase BAE Systems shares from pre-tax earnings as 'Partnership Shares', with your income tax and national insurance contributions reduced accordingly. We'll also award one free matching share for every two shares you buy, up to the first £30 invested each month.
Childcare vouchers - Most of our businesses allow eligible employees to sacrifice part of their salary and take childcare vouchers of an equivalent value.
Maternity leave - New mums receive up to 52 weeks' leave, irrespective of length of service. Afterwards, you can choose to come back to work on reduced hours (equivalent to 60% of previously worked hours for the first 13 weeks, with benefits being adjusted appropriately).
Paternity, adoption, parental and time off for dependents leave- All of these are covered within our Work Life Integration Policy. All entitlements exceed statutory requirements but eligibility requirements apply to some.
Discount arrangements - We offer our people and their immediate families a huge range of attractive discount arrangements on everything from cars to computers, white goods to vehicle rentals.

Our programs are tailored to support the needs of our employees and their families. We recognize the value of a diverse workforce and therefore include coverage for domestic partners and the children of domestic partners for our eligible employees.
The health and wellbeing of our employees is very important to us. We foster a culture of health through health fairs, and programs and activities that support healthy nutrition and exercise.
Product Allowance
We encourage our employees to act as ambassadors of our brands. To support this effort, eligible employees over the age of 21 have a product allowance to promote our brands with friends and family.

Access to relevant and modern learning opportunities
Community outreach and charitable gifting
Company car (or allowance) for eligible roles

company_benefits_employer_summary:
PayPal wants our employees to feel secure in their benefits, and we support your mental, physical, and emotional balance. Best of all, you are eligible for coverage on your date of hire.   Health and Welfare
Our fulltime U.S.-based employees are eligible for a variety of medical, dental, and vision plans, as well as Short- and Long-Term Disability, Life Insurance, and Accidental Death & Dismemberment (AD&D). Coverage choices for medical coverage will vary, depending on your US location. Dental and vision plan choices are available.   Financial Security 
Your financial security is important to us, so we offer a variety of options to choose from, including 401k Savings Plan, Employee Stock Purchase Plan, and Flexible Spending Accounts for health care and dependent care.  Time-Off Programs
PayPal recognizes that as employees pass through various life stages, their time away needs change accordingly. We provide support through the following programs: 

Sabbatical Program: 4 weeks of paid leave after completion of 5 years of service
Tracking-Free Vacation: all U.S.-based exempt employees self-manage vacation and work with supervisors to schedule time off.
Give Time: After one year of employment, eligible employees are paid 100% of base pay, or 8 hours/year, to volunteer at a qualifying community-based organization
Paid Sick Leave
Enhanced Maternity Benefit
Paid Bonding Leave within the first year of the birth or placement of a child; available to all mothers, fathers, same-sex spouses, and domestic partners
Paid Family Care Leave allows paid time off for employees to care for a seriously ill family member
Holidays: PayPal observes 10 holidays each year


Additional benefits to support your everyday living include adoption assistance, educational assistance, and employee assistance. We have the added extras too – group legal benefits, identity theft protection, and we even offer pet insurance.

Citi makes a significant investment to provide valuable benefit programs for all employees around the world.  These include core health, insurance and retirement programs as well as supplementary programs.
Our global benefits philosophy requires that programs should deliver quality benefits and be simple to understand, to access and communicate. Our Live Well at Citi Global Health Strategy, offers best in class wellness programs, tools and resources to help employees lead healthier lives. We strive to inspire accountability, improve health and productivity while managing our healthcare costs. Our programs are designed to support Citi’s values and help to attract, motivate and retain a diverse workforce within a collaborative work environment.

company_benefits_employer_summary:
PayPal wants our employees to feel secure in their benefits, and we support your mental, physical, and emotional balance. Best of all, you are eligible for coverage on your date of hire.   Health and Welfare
Our fulltime U.S.-based employees are eligible for a variety of medical, dental, and vision plans, as well as Short- and Long-Term Disability, Life Insurance, and Accidental Death & Dismemberment (AD&D). Coverage choices for medical coverage will vary, depending on your US location. Dental and vision plan choices are available.   Financial Security 
Your financial security is important to us, so we offer a variety of options to choose from, including 401k Savings Plan, Employee Stock Purchase Plan, and Flexible Spending Accounts for health care and dependent care.  Time-Off Programs
PayPal recognizes that as employees pass through various life stages, their time away needs change accordingly. We provide support through the following programs: 

Sabbatical Program: 4 weeks of paid leave after completion of 5 years of service
Tracking-Free Vacation: all U.S.-based exempt employees self-manage vacation and work with supervisors to schedule time off.
Give Time: After one year of employment, eligible employees are paid 100% of base pay, or 8 hours/year, to volunteer at a qualifying community-based organization
Paid Sick Leave
Enhanced Maternity Benefit
Paid Bonding Leave within the first year of the birth or placement of a child; available to all mothers, fathers, same-sex spouses, and domestic partners
Paid Family Care Leave allows paid time off for employees to care for a seriously ill family member
Holidays: PayPal observes 10 holidays each year


Additional benefits to support your everyday living include adoption assistance, educational assistance, and employee assistance. We have the added extras too – group legal benefits, identity theft protection, and we even offer pet insurance.

company_benefits_employer_summary:
Total Rewards
At Healthfirst, we provide a Total Rewards program that allows us to attract, engage and retain talented team members who embody our culture and share our commitment to provide the highest quality healthcare and related services to our members.
Health and Wellness
Our benefits packages include health and wellness benefits, as well as additional employee perks. 

Health benefits include: 

Medical, Dental, and Vision plan options
Wellness credits
Spring Health mental wellness program
Maternity, Bereavement, and Short Term/Long Term Disability leave options
Additional optional health coverage plans


Wellness benefits include:

Paid Time Off
9 Paid holidays, and 6 early office closure days
Social Justice day
Free Peloton App membership and discounts on bikes and treadmills
Health Food Cafes


Employee perks include:

401k with up to 6% match after 1 year
Annual incentive and merit increase potential
Tuition reimbursement for approved degree programs and certifications
Discounts and deals on travel, select memberships, and other special offers
Free online learning through our Employee Learning Platform

company_benefits_employer_summary:
Financial Benefits:

Next-day pay for quick access to your earnings
Weekend, overnight, and holiday pay incentives to recognize your hard work
401(k) and Profit Sharing programs to help you plan for your financial future
Referral bonuses for bringing in new team members and making a difference together

Health and Wellness Benefits:

Comprehensive medical, dental, vision, disability, and life insurance coverage
Health Savings Account (HSA), Flexible Spending Account (FSA), and Dependent Care Account (DCA) options to help you manage healthcare expenses
Tobacco cessation program to promote a healthier lifestyle - Get paid to quit smoking!
Mental health support to prioritize your well-being

Professional Development Benefits:

Paid training and certifications to help you develop new skills and advance your career
Tuition, licensure, and certification reimbursement to support your ongoing professional development
Opportunities for career advancement and growth to help you achieve your professional goals

Time Off Benefits:

Paid holidays to celebrate with family and friends
Paid time off (PTO) to help you recharge and maintain work-life balance
Floating holiday to use when you need it, for those unexpected moments or important personal events

Other Benefits:

Mileage and activity reimbursement for work-related travel
Flexible scheduling to fit your availability and personal needs
Employee appreciation programs to recognize your contributions and efforts

company_benefits_employer_summary: The benefits of working for an organization like Kaiser Permanente go beyond what might be considered traditional “benefits.” Sure, we offer competitive compensation. And our medical coverage is pretty amazing, as are our retirement plans. But it’s our commitment to caring for our employees holistically that rounds out the benefit of joining our team.Being a care-driven organization, we value health, wellness, and happiness above all and know that reaching your potential at work often starts with being your best outside of it. We recognize the benefit of wellness and work-life balance and provide many tools and resources to help our employees thrive. In fact, we’re consistently named a Best Employer for Healthy Lifestyles by the National Business Group on Health!Beyond encouraging everyone to be their best self, we also know that feeling good comes from owning your professional development. Which is why we embrace learning as a way of life. Whether you sit on the clinical, technical, or business side of our organization, you’ll be encouraged to explore your potential through career paths and educational opportunities that match your ambitions.While specific benefits vary based on location, position, scheduled hours, and representation by collective bargaining or employee groups, they generally include what you see in the summary below.

company_benefits_employer_summary:
We see and respect our team members as individuals with unique needs and goals. We believe in a human-centric approach to help each person thrive personally and professionally.
Here are some of the resources and support we provide to our team members:
Thoughtfully Designed Workspace
Our eco-friendly office supports collaboration, deep work, and downtime. Everyone has a standing desk and access to conference rooms, deep work spaces, a game room, and stocked kitchen. Our great room hosts learning sessions, weekly catered lunches, happy half-hours, and more!
Well-Being Support
We prioritize work-life integration and respect everyone’s time off to recharge. Our managers lead with context to directly support their team members. We emphasize mental health awareness and celebrate life milestones to foster happiness, health, and a sense of purpose for all.
Continuous Learning and Growth
Our training and mentorship programs are designed for personal and professional growth. Specialized manager training ensures effective guidance, while regular 1:1s, performance feedback, and dedicated career conversations provide ongoing support to be our best selves.
Well-Deserved Rewards
We believe in recognizing and rewarding hard work. In addition to a competitive salary (including a monthly education bonus), we offer comprehensive healthcare coverage on day one, disability, life insurance, paid parental leave, and a 401k plan with company match.

company_benefits_employer_summary:
PayPal wants our employees to feel secure in their benefits, and we support your mental, physical, and emotional balance. Best of all, you are eligible for coverage on your date of hire.   Health and Welfare
Our fulltime U.S.-based employees are eligible for a variety of medical, dental, and vision plans, as well as Short- and Long-Term Disability, Life Insurance, and Accidental Death & Dismemberment (AD&D). Coverage choices for medical coverage will vary, depending on your US location. Dental and vision plan choices are available.   Financial Security 
Your financial security is important to us, so we offer a variety of options to choose from, including 401k Savings Plan, Employee Stock Purchase Plan, and Flexible Spending Accounts for health care and dependent care.  Time-Off Programs
PayPal recognizes that as employees pass through various life stages, their time away needs change accordingly. We provide support through the following programs: 

Sabbatical Program: 4 weeks of paid leave after completion of 5 years of service
Tracking-Free Vacation: all U.S.-based exempt employees self-manage vacation and work with supervisors to schedule time off.
Give Time: After one year of employment, eligible employees are paid 100% of base pay, or 8 hours/year, to volunteer at a qualifying community-based organization
Paid Sick Leave
Enhanced Maternity Benefit
Paid Bonding Leave within the first year of the birth or placement of a child; available to all mothers, fathers, same-sex spouses, and domestic partners
Paid Family Care Leave allows paid time off for employees to care for a seriously ill family member
Holidays: PayPal observes 10 holidays each year


Additional benefits to support your everyday living include adoption assistance, educational assistance, and employee assistance. We have the added extras too – group legal benefits, identity theft protection, and we even offer pet insurance.

company_benefits_employer_summary:
NYSTEC Total Rewards 
We encourage, support, and compensate our employees based on our philosophy of Total Rewards. In addition to financial compensation, NYSTEC’s Total Rewards program believes in providing its employees the opportunity to excel and advance in their field, provide meaningful work, contribute to the community, work cooperatively and productively with colleagues, and balance work life duties.
employee_benefit_reviews:
["Generous 403b match, 20 PTO days which increase with years of service, tuition reimbursement, professional development reimbursement, savings or student loan matching, fitness reimbursement","401k is good. Pay isn’t that of industry standards. Upper management is allowed too much leeway as far as what employees are paid, even with pay grades. ","Benefits package is standard overall for an office environment. It's sold to employees as being an exemplary Total Rewards Package but it's essentially the same package you can get at any company. These are the main differences compared to other companies:

Pros: They usually give an additional payment to your retirement account if NYSTEC does well that year. There's a gift each quarter and an annual gift. Mobile phone is paid for up to a specified amount.

Cons: You can use Cigna providers if you travel outside of the Capital District but you're locked into MVP within the Albany area. Work/life balance is not guaranteed and depends on how well the project is negotiated when the contract is signed and how much your practice leader supports their team--you will be expected to make up for this by working more with less. Merit increases are not based on an objective process.

Since the majority of the projects are with state and local government clients, the benefits should compete with what you would receive as a civil servant. If you tell employees that you pay less than other consulting firms because the benefits are amazing, shouldn't the benefits be better than what our clients receive and also significantly better than what you can get at other firms? "]

company_benefits_employer_summary:
A productive and innovative workplace starts with the well-being of our employees. At iHeartMedia, the health and welfare of our team is of the utmost importance. We offer an extensive range of benefits that allow our employees to bring their best selves to work each day and we strive to continue to make iHeartMedia a great place to work:

Health & Wellness: Our comprehensive benefits package includes medical, dental and vision coverage, as well as family life and accident insurance.
Time Away: Our time-off policy offers 15 paid holidays, half-days before key holidays, plus vacation.
Financial: Employees can participate in a 401(k) program.
Our benefits programs also includes a variety of flexible spending accounts.
Parental Leave: Your family is part of the iHeartMedia family. We support employees throughout their lives, including the growth of their families with our Parental Leave policy, as well as additional short-term voluntary disability.
Other benefits: We offer voluntary benefits at discounted rates, including pet, legal and auto/home insurance, as well as identity theft.

company_benefits_employer_summary:
As an industry leader, Delta is proud to offer to all of our employees an appealing compensation package including competitive pay, excellent benefits and worldwide travel privileges.

Medical coverage, with options depending on where you live
Dental coverage with 3 options from which to choose
Vision coverage through Davis Vision
Domestic partner program which includes medical, dental and vision
Life insurance coverage of $50,000 provided by Delta
Optional additional life/dependent life/group accident/private pilot insurance
Optional disability benefit
Flexible spending accounts to cover eligible expenses
Employee assistance program, which focuses on your mental and emotional well being

Committed to maximizing your total compensation package and helping you plan for your financial future, Delta provides eligible employees access to a 401(k) savings plan, along with a profit sharing plan and a shared rewards program.

401(k) plan with automatic enrollment, automatic company contribution equal to 3% of your eligible pay and a 100% company match for the first 6% you contribute
Profit sharing with eligibility beginning on day one of employment; payout levels and amounts can vary annually, but in 2019 Delta distributed more than 16% of its pre-tax income
Shared reward program with monthly payouts based on the achievement of company wide goals
Paid vacation, holiday and personal time


Free and reduced rate travel benefits for you and your eligible family members
Matching gifts to education programs, up to $2,000 per year
Adoption assistance program with eligibility beginning on day one of employment
Employee discounts on a variety of products and services
An employee-powered scholarship fund, which awarded a total of $1.09 million to 591 recipients in 2017.

Product Allowance

company_benefits_employer_summary:
A productive and innovative workplace starts with the well-being of our employees. At iHeartMedia, the health and welfare of our team is of the utmost importance. We offer an extensive range of benefits that allow our employees to bring their best selves to work each day and we strive to continue to make iHeartMedia a great place to work:

Health & Wellness: Our comprehensive benefits package includes medical, dental and vision coverage, as well as family life and accident insurance.
Time Away: Our time-off policy offers 15 paid holidays, half-days before key holidays, plus vacation.
Financial: Employees can participate in a 401(k) program.
Our benefits programs also includes a variety of flexible spending accounts.
Parental Leave: Your family is part of the iHeartMedia family. We support employees throughout their lives, including the growth of their families with our Parental Leave policy, as well as additional short-term voluntary disability.
Other benefits: We offer voluntary benefits at discounted rates, including pet, legal and auto/home insurance, as well as identity theft.

company_benefits_employer_summary:
The Willis Towers Watson Global Total Rewards Philosophy aligns with our business strategy and supports our company values.  Our objective is to attract, retain, engage and develop the diverse talent that will lead to our collective success.  We offer market competitive programs that create a pay for performance culture, and provide choice in specific program features, wherever practical, to reflect the variety of colleague demographics and preferences in our global workforce.
Our Total Rewards Philosophy includes the following elements and types of programs, tailored as appropriate for specific roles and markets:

Foundational: Programs serving as the core elements of our overall Total Rewards program
Performance Based: Programs and opportunities driven by company, team and/or colleague success
Career and Environmental: Programs and opportunities supporting colleague growth, performance, community and work-life integration

company_benefits_employer_summary:
We care about your health and happiness and we want you to be at your best. At Oracle, you’ll enjoy a competitive benefits package with a variety of customizable medical options, savings plans, and wellness programs.
We also don’t think your life should be on hold from Monday to Friday. Generous amounts of time off, flexible work options, and lots of fun employee activities are all an important part of leading a balanced a life.
Hear about flexibility from Leor, one of Oracle’s Karate Club black belts—and make sure to check out some reviews from our employees.

company_benefits_employer_summary:
Our programs are tailored to support the needs of our employees and their families. We recognize the value of a diverse workforce and therefore include coverage for domestic partners and the children of domestic partners for our eligible employees.
The health and wellbeing of our employees is very important to us. We foster a culture of health through health fairs, and programs and activities that support healthy nutrition and exercise.
Product Allowance
We encourage our employees to act as ambassadors of our brands. To support this effort, eligible employees over the age of 21 have a product allowance to promote our brands with friends and family.
Additional Perks:

Flexible Work Environment
Casual dress code
Summer Fridays
Comprehensive health & wellness programs
Fertility & childcare benefits
Generous paid time off (including HQ being closed Christmas through New Years)
Yearly agility allowance
Tuition scholarships & reimbursement programs
Weekly themed happy hours
Access to relevant and modern learning opportunities
Community outreach and charitable gifting
Company car (or allowance) for eligible roles

Please note that this is only a brief overview of Pernod Ricard USA’s benefit offerings and does not supersede the official plan document and contracts.
Visit our benefits page for more information!
PRUSA Benefits
Canada Benefits

Being at the forefront of innovation isn’t the only perk we offer at HPE. We strive to provide our team members and their loved ones with a comprehensive suite of well-being benefits that support the whole you—your physical health, your mental, emotional and financial well-being, and social connections to your community.
We invest in your personal and professional development. We have specific programs catered to helping you reach any career goals you have — whether you want to become a knowledge expert in your field or apply your skills to another division.
Learn more around our global benefits here: https://cdn.phenompeople.com/CareerConnectResources/HPE1US/videos/hpe_-_wellness_2021_external_0827.80001080p-1645730890964.mp4

company_benefits_employer_summary:
A productive and innovative workplace starts with the well-being of our employees. At iHeartMedia, the health and welfare of our team is of the utmost importance. We offer an extensive range of benefits that allow our employees to bring their best selves to work each day and we strive to continue to make iHeartMedia a great place to work:

Health & Wellness: Our comprehensive benefits package includes medical, dental and vision coverage, as well as family life and accident insurance.
Time Away: Our time-off policy offers 15 paid holidays, half-days before key holidays, plus vacation.
Financial: Employees can participate in a 401(k) program.
Our benefits programs also includes a variety of flexible spending accounts.
Parental Leave: Your family is part of the iHeartMedia family. We support employees throughout their lives, including the growth of their families with our Parental Leave policy, as well as additional short-term voluntary disability.
Other benefits: We offer voluntary benefits at discounted rates, including pet, legal and auto/home insurance, as well as identity theft.

company_benefits_employer_summary:
NYSTEC Total Rewards 
We encourage, support, and compensate our employees based on our philosophy of Total Rewards. In addition to financial compensation, NYSTEC’s Total Rewards program believes in providing its employees the opportunity to excel and advance in their field, provide meaningful work, contribute to the community, work cooperatively and productively with colleagues, and balance work life duties.
employee_benefit_reviews:
["Generous 403b match, 20 PTO days which increase with years of service, tuition reimbursement, professional development reimbursement, savings or student loan matching, fitness reimbursement","401k is good. Pay isn’t that of industry standards. Upper management is allowed too much leeway as far as what employees are paid, even with pay grades. ","Benefits package is standard overall for an office environment. It's sold to employees as being an exemplary Total Rewards Package but it's essentially the same package you can get at any company. These are the main differences compared to other companies:

Pros: They usually give an additional payment to your retirement account if NYSTEC does well that year. There's a gift each quarter and an annual gift. Mobile phone is paid for up to a specified amount.

Cons: You can use Cigna providers if you travel outside of the Capital District but you're locked into MVP within the Albany area. Work/life balance is not guaranteed and depends on how well the project is negotiated when the contract is signed and how much your practice leader supports their team--you will be expected to make up for this by working more with less. Merit increases are not based on an objective process.

Since the majority of the projects are with state and local government clients, the benefits should compete with what you would receive as a civil servant. If you tell employees that you pay less than other consulting firms because the benefits are amazing, shouldn't the benefits be better than what our clients receive and also significantly better than what you can get at other firms? "]

company_benefits_employer_summary:
PayPal wants our employees to feel secure in their benefits, and we support your mental, physical, and emotional balance. Best of all, you are eligible for coverage on your date of hire.   Health and Welfare
Our fulltime U.S.-based employees are eligible for a variety of medical, dental, and vision plans, as well as Short- and Long-Term Disability, Life Insurance, and Accidental Death & Dismemberment (AD&D). Coverage choices for medical coverage will vary, depending on your US location. Dental and vision plan choices are available.   Financial Security 
Your financial security is important to us, so we offer a variety of options to choose from, including 401k Savings Plan, Employee Stock Purchase Plan, and Flexible Spending Accounts for health care and dependent care.  Time-Off Programs
PayPal recognizes that as employees pass through various life stages, their time away needs change accordingly. We provide support through the following programs: 

Sabbatical Program: 4 weeks of paid leave after completion of 5 years of service
Tracking-Free Vacation: all U.S.-based exempt employees self-manage vacation and work with supervisors to schedule time off.
Give Time: After one year of employment, eligible employees are paid 100% of base pay, or 8 hours/year, to volunteer at a qualifying community-based organization
Paid Sick Leave
Enhanced Maternity Benefit
Paid Bonding Leave within the first year of the birth or placement of a child; available to all mothers, fathers, same-sex spouses, and domestic partners
Paid Family Care Leave allows paid time off for employees to care for a seriously ill family member
Holidays: PayPal observes 10 holidays each year


Additional benefits to support your everyday living include adoption assistance, educational assistance, and employee assistance. We have the added extras too – group legal benefits, identity theft protection, and we even offer pet insurance.

company_benefits_employer_summary:
Un élément essentiel de la vision de notre entreprise est d'être le meilleur endroit où travailler. Dans le cadre de cet engagement, nous offrons à nos employés une rémunération et des avantages sociaux complets.
Notre philosophie globale en matière de rémunération totale consiste à offrir un salaire compétitif par rapport au marché tout en récompensant les employés pour leurs performances individuelles et commerciales.
Notre système de rémunération globale comprend un salaire de base et peut inclure une rémunération variable, comme des primes en espèces et une rémunération à base d'actions. Il comprend également des avantages compétitifs sur le marché qui varient selon la région et/ou la fonction, afin d'aider les employés à répondre à leurs besoins en matière de soins de santé, de protection des revenus, de finances, de retraite et de temps libre.

company_benefits_employer_summary: When the unexpected occursâa serious illness, a long absence from work, even deathâwe count on Stryker-sponsored healthcare and welfare benefits for financial protection. In addition, Stryker Corporation sponsors the Stryker Corporation 401(k) Savings and Retirement Plan so that you and other employees of Stryker and its participating subsidiaries (all referred to in this Summary as the "Company") may save for retirement on a "before-tax" basis. The benefits provided under the 401(k) Plan are in addition to Social Security. The information presented in the Benefits Summary makes it easy to understand your benefits. Consider this handbook, which is available in print and online at http://www.totalrewards.stryker.com/spd, your first resource whenever you have a question about what is covered, how to file claims or your rights as a plan participant. The benefits described are summaries of the official plan documents and contracts, which govern the plans. They are written in plain language to help you understand how the plans work.

Our programs are tailored to support the needs of our employees and their families. We recognize the value of a diverse workforce and therefore include coverage for domestic partners and the children of domestic partners for our eligible employees.
The health and wellbeing of our employees is very important to us. We foster a culture of health through health fairs, and programs and activities that support healthy nutrition and exercise.
Product Allowance
We encourage our employees to act as ambassadors of our brands. To support this effort, eligible employees over the age of 21 have a product allowance to promote our brands with friends and family.
Additional Perks:

Flexible Work Environment
Casual dress code
Summer Fridays
Comprehensive health & wellness programs
Fertility & childcare benefits
Generous paid time off (including HQ being closed Christmas through New Years)
Yearly agility allowance
Tuition scholarships & reimbursement programs
Weekly themed happy hours
Access to relevant and modern learning opportunities
Community outreach and charitable gifting
Company car (or allowance) for eligible roles

Our programs are designed to support Citi’s values and help to attract, motivate and retain a diverse workforce within a collaborative work environment.

company_benefits_employer_summary:
PayPal wants our employees to feel secure in their benefits, and we support your mental, physical, and emotional balance. Best of all, you are eligible for coverage on your date of hire.   Health and Welfare
Our fulltime U.S.-based employees are eligible for a variety of medical, dental, and vision plans, as well as Short- and Long-Term Disability, Life Insurance, and Accidental Death & Dismemberment (AD&D). Coverage choices for medical coverage will vary, depending on your US location. Dental and vision plan choices are available.   Financial Security 
Your financial security is important to us, so we offer a variety of options to choose from, including 401k Savings Plan, Employee Stock Purchase Plan, and Flexible Spending Accounts for health care and dependent care.  Time-Off Programs
PayPal recognizes that as employees pass through various life stages, their time away needs change accordingly. We provide support through the following programs: 

Sabbatical Program: 4 weeks of paid leave after completion of 5 years of service
Tracking-Free Vacation: all U.S.-based exempt employees self-manage vacation and work with supervisors to schedule time off.
Give Time: After one year of employment, eligible employees are paid 100% of base pay, or 8 hours/year, to volunteer at a qualifying community-based organization
Paid Sick Leave
Enhanced Maternity Benefit
Paid Bonding Leave within the first year of the birth or placement of a child; available to all mothers, fathers, same-sex spouses, and domestic partners
Paid Family Care Leave allows paid time off for employees to care for a seriously ill family member
Holidays: PayPal observes 10 holidays each year


Additional benefits to support your everyday living include adoption assistance, educational assistance, and employee assistance. We have the added extras too – group legal benefits, identity theft protection, and we even offer pet insurance.

company_benefits_employer_summary:
PayPal wants our employees to feel secure in their benefits, and we support your mental, physical, and emotional balance. Best of all, you are eligible for coverage on your date of hire.   Health and Welfare
Our fulltime U.S.-based employees are eligible for a variety of medical, dental, and vision plans, as well as Short- and Long-Term Disability, Life Insurance, and Accidental Death & Dismemberment (AD&D). Coverage choices for medical coverage will vary, depending on your US location. Dental and vision plan choices are available.   Financial Security 
Your financial security is important to us, so we offer a variety of options to choose from, including 401k Savings Plan, Employee Stock Purchase Plan, and Flexible Spending Accounts for health care and dependent care.  Time-Off Programs
PayPal recognizes that as employees pass through various life stages, their time away needs change accordingly. We provide support through the following programs: 

Sabbatical Program: 4 weeks of paid leave after completion of 5 years of service
Tracking-Free Vacation: all U.S.-based exempt employees self-manage vacation and work with supervisors to schedule time off.
Give Time: After one year of employment, eligible employees are paid 100% of base pay, or 8 hours/year, to volunteer at a qualifying community-based organization
Paid Sick Leave
Enhanced Maternity Benefit
Paid Bonding Leave within the first year of the birth or placement of a child; available to all mothers, fathers, same-sex spouses, and domestic partners
Paid Family Care Leave allows paid time off for employees to care for a seriously ill family member
Holidays: PayPal observes 10 holidays each year


Additional benefits to support your everyday living include adoption assistance, educational assistance, and employee assistance. We have the added extras too – group legal benefits, identity theft protection, and we even offer pet insurance.

At UnitedHealth Group, your total health and well-being are important to us. That’s why we have comprehensive benefits and resources to help you be your best at work and at home. Some of the benefits that you and the ones you love will enjoy when you start a career with us include:

Health and well-being programs and services
Flexible work schedule and remote-friendly positions
Health, vision and dental benefits
HSA and FSA eligible plans
401(k) savings plan
Childcare benefits
Short-term/ long-term disability coverage
Basic life insurance and AD&D
Employee stock purchase plan
Home office stipend for remote employees

Learn more

company_benefits_employer_summary:
Our programs are tailored to support the needs of our employees and their families. We recognize the value of a diverse workforce and therefore include coverage for domestic partners and the children of domestic partners for our eligible employees.
The health and wellbeing of our employees is very important to us. We foster a culture of health through health fairs, and programs and activities that support healthy nutrition and exercise.
Product Allowance
We encourage our employees to act as ambassadors of our brands. To support this effort, eligible employees over the age of 21 have a product allowance to promote our brands with friends and family.
Additional Perks:

Flexible Work Environment
Casual dress code
Summer Fridays
Comprehensive health & wellness programs
Fertility & childcare benefits
Generous paid time off (including HQ being closed Christmas through New Years)
Yearly agility allowance
Tuition scholarships & reimbursement programs
Weekly themed happy hours
Access to relevant and modern learning opportunities
Community outreach and charitable gifting
Company car (or allowance) for eligible roles

Please note that this is only a brief overview of Pernod Ricard USA’s benefit offerings and does not supersede the official plan document and contracts.
Visit our benefits page for more information!
PRUSA Benefits
Canada Benefits

company_benefits_employer_summary:
We believe your opportunities should fit your gifts and abilities so you can be rewarded for valuable contributions you make. We also look to provide benefit choices aligned with individual values and personal situations because we know health and wellness is important to you. This allows us to provide the right support, no matter what Koch company you work for, or where you live around the globe. (Benefits vary by location.)
Health & Wellness
We prioritize wellness with great medical, dental, vision, life insurance and disability coverage. Our health plan options are customized to fit the lifestyles of our global employees and include numerous life-balancing tools like virtual visits, a 24/7 nurse line, family counseling and other assistance programs.
Financial Resilience
Get valuable resources and budgeting tools to boost your financial health. Options vary by location, but can include 401(k) matching, tuition reimbursement, financial coaches, legal counsel, health savings accounts, flexible spending accounts, life insurance and disability coverage.
Contribution-Based Rewards
We are motivated to maximize our individual contributions – and it’s always great to get rewarded for them. We expect every supervisor and employee to work together to continually strive for better – which often leads to exponential growth.
Families First
Quality care is essential for healthy, growing families. Beyond our core benefits, we offer employees and their loved ones a broad range of regionally tailored support, including maternity and paternity leave, adoption assistance, fertility treatment coverage and other dedicated resources.
Flexible Work
Everyone has individual work and personal needs, and flexible work is a benefit valued by many. We seek to enable the best work environment that helps you and the business work together to produce superior results.
Lifelong Learning
Continuous learning is an expectation because your career journey is ever-changing. With a focus on the individual, we find new ways to develop our skills and abilities, whether it’s through conferences, classes or higher education. We provide the support and assistance each person needs to grow.

company_benefits_employer_summary: When the unexpected occursâa serious illness, a long absence from work, even deathâwe count on Stryker-sponsored healthcare and welfare benefits for financial protection. In addition, Stryker Corporation sponsors the Stryker Corporation 401(k) Savings and Retirement Plan so that you and other employees of Stryker and its participating subsidiaries (all referred to in this Summary as the "Company") may save for retirement on a "before-tax" basis. The benefits provided under the 401(k) Plan are in addition to Social Security. The information presented in the Benefits Summary makes it easy to understand your benefits. Consider this handbook, which is available in print and online at http://www.totalrewards.stryker.com/spd, your first resource whenever you have a question about what is covered, how to file claims or your rights as a plan participant. The benefits described are summaries of the official plan documents and contracts, which govern the plans. They are written in plain language to help you understand how the plans work.

company_benefits_employer_summary:
Our programs are tailored to support the needs of our employees and their families. We recognize the value of a diverse workforce and therefore include coverage for domestic partners and the children of domestic partners for our eligible employees.
The health and wellbeing of our employees is very important to us. We foster a culture of health through health fairs, and programs and activities that support healthy nutrition and exercise.
Product Allowance
We encourage our employees to act as ambassadors of our brands. To support this effort, eligible employees over the age of 21 have a product allowance to promote our brands with friends and family.
Additional Perks:

Flexible Work Environment
Casual dress code
Summer Fridays
Comprehensive health & wellness programs
Fertility & childcare benefits
Generous paid time off (including HQ being closed Christmas through New Years)
Yearly agility allowance
Tuition scholarships & reimbursement programs
Weekly themed happy hours
Access to relevant and modern learning opportunities
Community outreach and charitable gifting
Company car (or allowance) for eligible roles

Please note that this is only a brief overview of Pernod Ricard USA’s benefit offerings and does not supersede the official plan document and contracts.
Visit our benefits page for more information!

Canada Benefits

Total Rewards
At Healthfirst, we provide a Total Rewards program that allows us to attract, engage and retain talented team members who embody our culture and share our commitment to provide the highest quality healthcare and related services to our members.
Health and Wellness
Our benefits packages include health and wellness benefits, as well as additional employee perks. 

Health benefits include: 

Medical, Dental, and Vision plan options
Wellness credits
Spring Health mental wellness program
Maternity, Bereavement, and Short Term/Long Term Disability leave options

Wellness benefits include:

Paid Time Off
9 Paid holidays, and 6 early office closure days
Social Justice day
Free Peloton App membership and discounts on bikes and treadmills
Health Food Cafes


Employee perks include:

401k with up to 6% match after 1 year
Annual incentive and merit increase potential
Tuition reimbursement for approved degree programs and certifications
Discounts and deals on travel, select memberships, and other special offers
Free online learning through our Employee Learning Platform

company_benefits_employer_summary:
Everyone has their own personal and career goals. We strive to create an environment where associates can achieve both. This means giving our eligible associates flexibility and choice in the way they manage their careers, work schedules, and personal and family needs.
Broadridge offers a broad selection of benefits as part of our total rewards package to support our associates at every stage of life and career. Our flexible and high-value benefit options are designed to promote physical, emotional, social, and financial well-being—at home and at work. This includes healthcare and insurance benefits, health savings accounts, pretax commuter benefits or green transport tax savings programs, life and disability insurance, business travel accident insurance, charitable gift matching, and on-site health centers at certain locations.
In addition to comprehensive healthcare options and a flexible work schedule program, Broadridge also offers to eligible associates programs designed to promote the best possible environment, which are reviewed and updated regularly to ensure effectiveness. These include, but are not limited to, those shown here.

company_benefits_employer_summary: The benefits of working for an organization like Kaiser Permanente go beyond what might be considered traditional “benefits.” Sure, we offer competitive compensation. And our medical coverage is pretty amazing, as are our retirement plans. But it’s our commitment to caring for our employees holistically that rounds out the benefit of joining our team.Being a care-driven organization, we value health, wellness, and happiness above all and know that reaching your potential at work often starts with being your best outside of it. We recognize the benefit of wellness and work-life balance and provide many tools and resources to help our employees thrive. In fact, we’re consistently named a Best Employer for Healthy Lifestyles by the National Business Group on Health!Beyond encouraging everyone to be their best self, we also know that feeling good comes from owning your professional development. Which is why we embrace learning as a way of life. Whether you sit on the clinical, technical, or business side of our organization, you’ll be encouraged to explore your potential through career paths and educational opportunities that match your ambitions.While specific benefits vary based on location, position, scheduled hours, and representation by collective bargaining or employee groups, they generally include what you see in the summary below.

company_benefits_employer_summary:
At Ellis Island, Casino, Hotel, Brewery, and Village Pubs, we prioritize the well-being and satisfaction of our team members. We understand that a supportive work environment and excellent benefits are crucial to fostering a motivated and productive team. Here’s what you can expect when you join us:
Health and Wellness: Your well-being matters to us. We provide medical insurance, dental insurance, vision insurance, basic life insurance, a short-term disability plan, and a combo plan that provides support in case of accidents, hospitalizations, and critical illnesses.
Retirement Savings: Plan for your future with our 401(k) retirement savings plan, after one year of successful employment.
Work-Life Balance: We offer paid time off because we value your personal time.
Professional Development: Grow your career with us. We support continuous learning and offer opportunities for growth and development.
Employee Assistance Program (EAP): We partner with Behavioral Healthcare Options through The Life Connection (TLC) employee assistance and work-life program to provide mental health and counseling services.
Employee Discounts and Perks: Enjoy a free meal during your shift, free on-site parking. and employee discounts company-wide.
Diversity and Inclusion: We embrace diversity and foster an inclusive workplace where every voice is heard and valued.
